description: Are you an experienced Defense Attorney interested in joining an established legal firm? We are looking for a motivated and thorough attorney with at least three years of experience in defending clients in lien and litigation cases. If you are interested in taking your career to the next level, this position is for you. Top Reasons to Work with Us At our firm, you will have the opportunity to work with a team of professionals who are committed to delivering the highest standard of service to our clients. Our firm offers a challenging and stimulating work experience designed to help you grow your legal career. We understand that our success is dependent on our team of dedicated professionals, which is why we are committed to providing a supportive and encouraging work environment.
responsibilities: Assume responsibility for cases at all levels of complexity, Communicate with clients, Develop strategies leading to efficient resolution of cases, Negotiate and settle cases-in-chief as well as liens, Draft pleadings and reports, Handle all aspects of workers compensation litigation

qualifications.required: 3+ years of workers compensation experience, Valid CA Bar License

benefits: Competitive base salary: $150-200,000/Year (DOE), PTO, Holidays, Sick Leave, Health, Dental, Vision, Life and LTC Insurance, 401k, Bonus
